overview: To close out Ultra Music Festival's Friday 2015 line-up, Tiesto had a small mess up during his performance. In front a audience of thousands of people, Tiesto’s feed went silent for a few seconds. Once his sound came back he told the crowd “so as you guys can hear, I never do a pre-mix. It’s all live.”
tagline: Tiesto live in Miami at the Ultra Music Festival - March 27, 2015.
title: Tiesto - Live at Ultra Music Festival 2015
